synopsis.text:
Persian merchants, imperial court generals, and a realm of aliens collide in this thrilling anime set during the prosperous Tang Dynasty. When Huangfu Duanhua, a general of the imperial court, is swept into a series of supernatural events after his friend enters a Persian merchant's store, he finds himself entangled in a web of sealed secrets and royal strife.

Meanwhile, in Luoling City, Chang'an Magic Street becomes the epicenter of a cosmic clash between the human race, led by the Tianxuan sect, and an alien realm. An abnormal earthquake has connected these two worlds, and the aliens living in Luoling City must maintain the secret to prevent a catastrophic battle from erupting.

Enter Gu Shaoning, a young man from the human race who stumbles upon Chang'an Magic Street and befriends an alien residing there. As he uncovers the secret of Chang'an Magic Street, his once ordinary destiny undergoes a seismic shift, propelling him into the heart of the conflict between the human and alien realms. With the wheel of fortune turning, Gu Shaoning must navigate the treacherous waters of sect disputes and inter-realm strife, as he becomes increasingly entwined in the vortex of battle.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
